definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
ancient unit of volume (half a 合[ge3], equivalent to 50ml)/ancient flute
One key opens one lock./There is a different solution for each problem. (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 ba3 yao4 shi5 kai1 yi1 ba3 suo3

definition: Today is the key to the past.
pinyin: xian4 zai4 shi4 guo4 qu5 yao4 shi5

sentences.english: Public-key systems have several advantages over secret-key systems.
sentences.chinese: 鑰系統對數據進行加密。

sentences.english: This property is the key for the keyed hash algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 這個屬性是有金鑰的雜湊演算法之金鑰。

sentences.english: This property is the key for the keyed hash algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 這個屬性是有金鑰的雜湊演算法之金鑰。

sentences.english: I found a wallet in the desk.
sentences.chinese: 我鑰裎桌裏發現了一個錢苞。

sentences.english: The secret-key system then encrypts the data.
sentences.chinese: 然後祕鑰系統對數據進行加密。

sentences.english: Retrieves the security token that matches the specified key identifier clause.
sentences.chinese: 擷取與指定之金鑰識別碼子句相符的安全性權杖。

sentences.english: Our scheme can deal with both group key and pairwise key, which are the same important for wireless sensor networks.
sentences.chinese: 我們的這個機制同時考慮到了羣體金鑰以及成對金鑰。

sentences.english: Some properties must be added to a key when it is created.
sentences.chinese: 某些屬性必須在建立金鑰時加入至金鑰。

sentences.english: One disadvantage of public-key system is that they are slower than secret-key systems.
sentences.chinese: 公鑰系統的一個不利之處是速度比祕鑰系統慢。

sentences.english: One disadvantage of public-key systems is that they are slower than secret-key systems.
sentences.chinese: 明鑰系統的一個不利之處是速度比祕鑰系統慢。

sentences.english: In the previous section, we exchanged a secret key.
sentences.chinese: 在前一節中，我們交換了一個祕鑰。

definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
door to women's room/gate to palace
